trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift without material components after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10+10) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6+10) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8+10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Soothing Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the calm emotions spell (both effects) for 1 minute. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the effect is dispelled, or the dragon attacks, the effect ends and the creature is immune to the dragon's Soothing Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Explosive Gem
items.entry: The dragon spits an amethyst sphere up to 60 feet away. The gem explodes into razor—sharp shards in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Kinetic Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales a beam of glimmering energy in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. The first object or creature of Large size or smaller in that line must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or become restrained until the start of its next turn. The amethyst dragon may telekinetically hurl any creature or object restrained in this way up to 120 feet in any direction, dealing 1d6 bludgeoning damage per 10 feet traveled.

entries: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6+10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Explosive Gem (Recharge 5—6)

action.name: Explosive Gem (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon spits an amethyst sphere up to 30 feet away. The gem explodes into razor—sharp shards in a 20-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spell, requiring no components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Blinding Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10+7) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6+7) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8+7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blinding Presence
entries: The dragon shines with internal light. Each creature within 120 feet that can see the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Blinding Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Razor Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales razor—sharp crystalline shards in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Blinding Beam
items.entry: The dragon breathes a beam of blinding light in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be blinded for 1d4 rounds and 14 (4d6) radiant damage, or no blindness and half as much damage on a successful save.

entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8+10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Razor Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales razor—sharp topaz shards in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Dehydrating Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales desiccating heat in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

entries: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6+10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then swim up to half its swimming speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 24). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift without material components after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10+7) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6+7) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8+7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Razor Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales razor—sharp topaz shards in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Dehydrating Breath
items.entry: The dragon exhales desiccating heat in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

entries: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6+7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then swim up to half its swimming speed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 21). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: The dragon can cast plane shift without material components after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10+6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

action.name: Razor Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales razor—sharp topaz shards in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Razor Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The dragon exhales razor—sharp topaz shards in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monster.name: Sardior
monster.immune: fire, force, psychic, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

trait.name: Divine Resurrection
entries: When Sardior dies, his body vanishes in a shower of ruby scales and his essence merges with that of his oldest thane (Hrodel). This thane retreats to safety and begins the slow transformation into Sardior, retaining her old memories and gaining Sardior's. All remaining thanes instantly sense Sardior's death.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If Sardior fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Unless he wishes to be affected, Sardior is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical or psionic effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Sardior's weapon attacks and breath weapons are magical.

trait.name: Planar Travel
entries: Sardior can cast plane shift after spending one hour in uninterrupted meditation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sardior can use his Awesome Presence. He then makes four attacks: one with his bite, two with his claws, and one with his tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10+9) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6+9) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 25 ft., up to three targets. Hit: 27 (4d8+9) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from Sardior.

action.name: Awesome Presence
entries: Perceiving Sardior's divine form overwhelms the minds of mortal creatures. Each creature of Sardior's choice that is within 240 feet of Sardior and aware of him must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become incapacitated for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Sardior's Awesome Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5—6)
entries: Sardior uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Concussive Breath
items.entry: Sardior exhales concussive force in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures reduced to 0 hit points by this breath weapon fall unconscious and are stable.

items.name: Radiant Breath
items.entry: Sardior exhales a blast of radiant light in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) radiant damage and becoming blinded for 1d4 rounds on a failed save, or taking half as much damage without being blinded on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Breath
entries: Sardior breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Sardior can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Energy Adaptation
entries: Sardior gains resistance to acid, cold, lightning, poison, or thunder damage until the start of his next turn.

legendary.name: Wing Attack
entries: Sardior beats his wings. Each creature within 10 feet of him must succeed on a DC 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 16 (2d6+9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Sardior can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Psychoregeneration (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sardior restores 5d10 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: Sardior's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 27). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
Additionally, Sardior can cast any spell of 6th level or lower on the bard or cleric spell list by making a DC 30 Intelligence (Arcana) check.

monster.name: Sardorian Golem
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned
monster.languages: understands commands given in any language, but cannot speak

trait.name: Magic Attacks
entries: The golem's weapon attacks and breath weapons are magical.

trait.name: Psionic Conduit
entries: When Sardior casts a spell with his Innate Spellcasting (Psionics) feature, he can treat any Sardorian golem on the same plane of existence as the spell's point of origin. If he wishes, he can also speak through the mouth of any Sardorian golem on any plane of existence.

trait.name: Psychometabolic Shield
entries: If the golem and Sardior are within 120 feet of each other, half of any damage Sardior takes is transferred to the golem.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes four attacks: one bite attack, two claw attacks, and one wing attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10+6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

action.name: Wing
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Razor Breath (Recharge 5—6)
entries: The golem exhales razorsharp quartz shards in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) slashing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
